what_you_do: Christianne Zurowski is a coach who helps individuals and groups develop their Body Intelligence (BQ™) to lead with presence, purpose, and ease.
who_you_serve: Individuals and groups looking to shift from automatic to intentional living and leadership.
social_proof: Christianne is a member of the Canadian Association of Professional Speakers and is listed on the IROOZE divorce directory.
signature_programs: Transformational Journey, Self Leadership BQ program, Embodied Leader- Team Accelerator
business_focus: Helping clients develop body intelligence to lead with presence, purpose, and ease.
service_provided: 1-1 coaching, group workshops, online courses, embodiment coaching
